contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
This new "Open preview in new tab" feature would be quite a handy way for our editors to share un-published pages between themselves while they are working/reviewing stuff. We are getting a **500 error** though when trying to open another editor's preview link which makes me think it's a feature meant to preview **your own work only** on a new tab sans the admin ui?
Steps to reproduce: In the admin, generate a "Preview in new tab" link and send it to another editor in the same system or try opening it with another browser logged in with a different user.
---
**Environment** - Xperience by Kentico version: [29.1.2] - .NET version: [8] - Deployment environment: [SaaS|Azure|VM]
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageTitle: "Open preview in new tab" feature question
